org.gridlab.gat.resources
Interface Reservation

public interface Reservation

An instance implementing this interface represents a reservation for resources.

Method Summary
 void cancel()
          This method upon successfully completing cancels the reservation corresponding to the associated Reservation instance.
 Resource getResource()
          This operation returns the GATResource corresponding to this GATReservation instance.
 

Method Detail

cancel

public void cancel()
            throws RemoteException,
                   IOException
This method upon successfully completing cancels the reservation corresponding to the associated Reservation instance.

Throws:
RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance
IOException - Upon non-remote IO problem

getResource

public Resource getResource()
This operation returns the GATResource corresponding to this GATReservation instance. That instance can in turn call the operation GetReservation to obtain this GATReservation instance.

Returns:
The Resource, or null when the reservation is expired or cancelled.
